help.preface:
Bells and whistles to write an awesome recipe
Using these formats will make your recipe able to scale, change units and show ingredients
All these markdown is wrapped with square brackets ([])

step.description: Any line starting with a hyphen (-) will be a completable step.

heading.description: Any line starting with a hash (#) will be a heading.

ingredient.description: Any ingredients will show them at the top in the ingredient list.

scalable.description: Add a number at the beginning and you can now scale them. Units are optional and should not have a space between the number and the value.

time.description: Timers can be either hh:mm:ss or mm:ss

image.description: Images can be uploaded from here directly onto Imgur, or use whatever image hosting you prefer. A name is optional (and highly encouraged).
